title: Tapioca Pearl Forming Machine
detail: It isn't natural for tapioca pearls to be black!
extended_details:
Know what goes into your tapioca pearls by making them yourself! Building a mini tumbler that rolls tapioca balls with a mixing bowl, motor, and some computer vision for quality assurance.
https://youtu.be/cV2E1qUDTis
